subject: Hair
Super Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: Steelers defensive end Brett Keisel’s beard has 20,000 Facebook fans, a Web site and a song. Keisel has denied taking beard-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Steelers defensive end Brett Keisel’s beard has 20,000 Facebook fans, a Web site and a song. Keisel has denied taking beard-enhancing drugs.
